about_the_game:
Hard Work is a 3D factory simulation game.

Start with little money and a small lot to build start your factory.
Buy the necessary equipment and employ your factory workers to reach profit.
Place your equipment at the right place and the production line will be able to make as much profit as possible.
A business can have different kind of struggles and you should be prepared to face them.

Create your own factory and see how successful you can be!

Key features:

• Hire workers, fire workers, give them a raise or don't and they'll probably quit

• Order materials(like wood, plastic, metal etc)
• Supply your factory with materials
• Convert materials to a final product
• Pack your finished product and stack the boxes on a pallet
• Wrap your pallets with the pallet Wrap Machine
• There's a forklift
• A leveling system that gives you bonus funds every 24h depending on your profit margins
